scripts.deploy-test: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:fix && sls deploy --config ./serverless-test.yml
scripts.deploy-test-ci: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:fix && sls deploy --config ./serverless-test-ci.yml
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:fix && sls deploy --config ./serverless-prod.yml
scripts.deploy-prod-ci: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:fix && sls deploy --config ./serverless-prod-ci.yml
scripts.deploy-domain-test: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:fix && sls create_domain --config ./serverless-test.yml
scripts.deploy-domain-prod: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:fix && sls create_domain --config ./serverless-prod.yml
